api_list.name: Status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skip-auth.p.rapidapi.com/api/users"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skip-auth.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://skip-auth.p.rapidapi.com/api/verification/ticket"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skip-auth.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://skip-auth.p.rapidapi.com/api/verification/ticket"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
